snippet: Wine professionals are drawn in by Serge Hochar, the 72-year-old guiding spirit of Château Musar, the Lebanese wine, and his flights of philosophical fancy.
abstract: Wine professionals are drawn in by Serge Hochar, the 72-year-old guiding spirit of Château Musar, the Lebanese wine, and his flights of philosophical fancy.

headline.main: Traveling the World,  Bottles Full of Miracles
